name: Rayman Raving Rabbids: Reburrowed
summary:
Rayman Raving Rabbids Reburrowed is a fan made project aiming to reimagine the early adventure platformer version and concepts of Rayman Raving Rabbids and make a full experience of the game that could have been, but never was.
It will be an adventure game taking place in around 8 byte-sized open worlds
Each world will have its own challenges centered around platforming, combat, and utilizing each worlds unlockable mount, like a spider that can climb almost anywhere and shoot fire, or an eagle that can fly anywhere and pick up other creatures and mounts, either for a challenge, or just for fun, your choice.
The worlds will be designed so you can freely roam anywhere in the overworld, be it on foot, on a creature mount, or any of the rabbid machinery you may find.
You will fight rabbids, dance with them, and save the creatures of the glade, especially everyone's favorite, teensies, who are trapped in facilities the rabbids have constructed around each world, you must free them and take them with you to be able to summon the creature mount of the world.
